name: Colour of the World
description: This game is a time based management game where you will need to go around to different buildings and trying to find chest that will give you a colour counter and to get enough so that the player can then go up the stairs to get to the next level so that you can do the same objective till the final level where the time will stop and it will show you how long it took. Don't expect to do the same time again because the colours and the amount given are randomized meaning that the person will need to go around and change the different route they take with some being quicker while others are slower.
